subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Steroids
Olympic Games
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Doctors
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dr. Astaphan supplied the Canadian sprinter Ben Johnson with banned drugs before he won a gold medal in the 1988 Seoul Olympics.
snippet: Dr. Astaphan supplied the Canadian sprinter Ben Johnson with banned drugs before he won a gold medal in the 1988 Seoul Olympics.
